title: Xiaomi 17 Pro Max 5G Dual SIM
description: The Xiaomi 17 Pro Max 5G Dual SIM is a high-end smartphone with a 6.73-inch display, 120Hz refresh rate, and 1080p resolution. It is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor and has 12GB of RAM and 256GB of storage. It also has a 50MP main camera and a 20MP front camera.

title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G
description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra features a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a 200MP main camera with 10x optical zoom. Includes S Pen support and all-day battery life.

title: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max boasts a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, A17 Pro chip, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a 48MP Pro camera system with 5x telephoto zoom. Features titanium design, USB-C connectivity, and advanced video recording capabilities.

title: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: The Google Pixel 8 Pro features a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display, Google Tensor G3 chip, 12GB RAM, 128GB storage, and a 50MP main camera with 5x telephoto zoom. Includes AI-powered features, Magic Editor, and 7 years of software updates.

title: OnePlus 12 5G
description: The OnePlus 12 features a 6.82-inch LTPO OLED display with 120Hz, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, 16GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a 50MP main camera with Hasselblad tuning. Includes 100W fast charging and premium build quality.

title: iPad Pro 12.9-inch M3
description: The iPad Pro 12.9-inch features the M3 chip, 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with ProMotion, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, and support for Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard. Perfect for creative professionals and power users.

title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra
description: The Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra features a 14.6-inch Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, and S Pen support. Includes IP68 water resistance and DeX mode for desktop-like experience.

title: MacBook Pro 16-inch M3 Pro
description: The MacBook Pro 16-inch features the M3 Pro chip, 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, 18GB unified memory, 512GB SSD, and up to 22 hours of battery life. Ideal for video editing, coding, and professional workloads.

title: Dell XPS 15 OLED
description: The Dell XPS 15 features a 15.6-inch 4K OLED display, Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and NVIDIA RTX 4050 graphics. Premium build with carbon fiber palm rest and excellent keyboard.

title: Apple Watch Ultra 2
description: The Apple Watch Ultra 2 features a 49mm titanium case, Always-On Retina display, S9 SiP chip, and up to 36 hours of battery life. Includes action button, precision dual-frequency GPS, and dive computer features.

title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic
description: The Galaxy Watch 6 Classic features a 47mm case with rotating bezel, 1.5-inch Super AMOLED display, Exynos W930 chip, and 40 hours of battery life. Includes advanced health tracking, ECG, and BIA sensors.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 features industry-leading noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, quick charge, and premium sound quality with LDAC support. Comfortable over-ear design with touch controls.

title: AirPods Pro 2 USB-C
description: The AirPods Pro 2 features active noise cancellation, spatial audio, H2 chip, and up to 6 hours of listening time with case providing 30 hours total. Includes USB-C charging and MagSafe compatibility.

title: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: The Nintendo Switch OLED features a 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, 64GB internal storage, and wide adjustable stand. Play in handheld, tabletop, or TV mode with thousands of games.

title: PlayStation 5 Slim
description: The PlayStation 5 Slim features an AMD Zen 2 processor, custom RDNA 2 GPU, 825GB SSD, and supports 4K gaming at 120Hz. Includes DualSense wireless controller with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers.

title: Xbox Series X
description: The Xbox Series X features custom AMD Zen 2 processor, RDNA 2 GPU, 1TB NVMe SSD, and supports 4K gaming at 120fps with ray tracing. Includes backward compatibility and Game Pass integration.

title: DJI Mini 4 Pro Drone
description: The DJI Mini 4 Pro features 4K/60fps video recording, 48MP photos, 3-directional obstacle sensing, ActiveTrack 6.0, and up to 34 minutes of flight time. Weighs under 249g for easier regulations.

title: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
description: The Canon EOS R6 Mark II features a 24.2MP full-frame sensor, 4K/60p video, 40fps continuous shooting, in-body image stabilization, and dual pixel autofocus. Professional camera for photography and videography.

title: Meta Quest 3 VR Headset
description: The Meta Quest 3 features pancake lenses, Snapdragon XR2 Gen 2 chip, mixed reality passthrough, 128GB storage, and Touch Plus controllers. Access to thousands of VR games and experiences.

title: Oculus Quest 2
description: The Oculus Quest 2 features a fast-switch LCD display, Snapdragon XR2 processor, 128GB storage, and wireless VR gaming. Includes Touch controllers and access to VR apps, games, and social experiences.
